amendment.description: To set aside additional funds for the Mni Wiconi project, South Dakota.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1677 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1677 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Daschle. (consideration: CR S11533; text: CR S11533) To set aside additional funds for the Mni Wiconi project, South Dakota.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1677 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Daschle.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1677 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
